## shiny

### UI

#### layout

* shinyUI
    * fluidPage
        * `title = "app title"`
        * `theme = "app.css(in www directory)"`
        * titlePanel
        * sidebarLayout
            * `position = c("left", "right")`
            * sidebarPanel
            * mainPanel
        * fluidRow
            * column
                * `offset = 1`
                * wellPanel
        * tabsetPanel
            * tabPanel
        * navlistPanel
            * tabPanel
    * navbarPage
        * tabPanel
        * navbarMenu
            * tabPanel
    * fixedPage
        * fixedRow
            * column

* shinyServer(function(input, output){...})
    * input$input_name
    * output$output_name

#### output and render

* plotOutput -> renderPlot
* imageOutput -> renderImage
* textOutput -> renderText
* htmlOutput -> renderUI
* uiOutput -> renderUI
* verbatimTextOutput
* tableOutput -> renderTable
* DTOutput -> renderDT

#### html elements

add html elements inside `*Panel` functions. `tags` lists all the tag functions. any HTML tag attributes can be set as an argument inside the tag functions. e.g., `id="id", class="class-name"`

* `p()`
* `h[1-6]()`
* `div()`
* `span()`
* `pre()`
* `code()`
* `a()`
* `img()`
* `strong()`
* `emp()`
* `br()`
* `hr()`
* `HTML()`


### running

```r
  shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
  
  runApp("/app/dir")
```
